task.title: Joining Groups
task.shortdesc: Join groups to meet others who share your interests.

context.p: Ravelry users have created thousands of interest groups, so you can find knitters and crocheters who share your interests, both fiber- and non-fiber-related.

step.cmd: Browse or search groups by location, interest, or tags.

choices.choice: Click on Browse by Location to find groups in various geographical locations.
Click on Search by Tags to view a cloud of tags for different groups.
Type a search term in the search field and click Search to look for specific groups.

step.cmd: Once you have found a group you want to join, click Join Group on that group's page.
